product_overview: QuantumLeap Trading Platform is a comprehensive AI-powered trading solution that integrates real-time portfolio management, live broker data, and advanced AI insights to empower retail traders with automated trading strategies, market analysis, and performance analytics within a secure and accessible web platform.
core_goals: Provide seamless OAuth2-based authentication with broker integrations ensuring secure, persistent sessions.
Enable real-time portfolio tracking including holdings management, P&L calculations, and performance metrics.
Offer tight broker integration via Kite Connect API for live data feeds, order execution, and account synchronization.
Leverage multi-provider AI engines (OpenAI, Anthropic Claude, Google Gemini) to deliver actionable trading insights, chat assistance, strategy templates, and market intelligence.
Deliver real-time trading signals optimized for mobile devices with alert systems and analytic tools.
Ensure responsive, mobile-first design with PWA capabilities supporting offline usage and accessibility compliance (WCAG standards).
Implement comprehensive error handling, user feedback, and robust testing coverage for frontend and backend components.
Provide performance monitoring dashboards to track system health, resource usage, and trading strategy effectiveness.
key_features: OAuth2-based Authentication and JWT-secured sessions including broker OAuth callbacks and token refresh.
Portfolio Management dashboard with real-time holdings, P&L analytics, and performance visualization.
Broker Integration using Kite Connect API for live market data, order management, and synchronization.
AI-Powered Insights featuring multi-provider chat interface, market analysis, trading recommendations, and strategy template deployment.
Real-time Trading Signals with mobile-optimized dashboards, alert system, and analytics.
Mobile Optimization with touch-friendly UI, offline support through service workers, and PWA functionality.
Accessibility Features ensuring keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and color contrast compliance.
Robust Error Handling with global error boundaries, error reporting dashboard, and user testing/feedback interface.
Performance Analytics dashboards for resource monitoring, performance metrics, and optimization tools.
AI Chat interface for interactive trading assistance and conversational insights integrated via secured API endpoints.
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs in via OAuth2 flow supporting Zerodha and Upstox brokers, establishing secure JWT sessions.
User accesses the portfolio dashboard to view real-time holdings, P&L, and AI-generated analysis.
User links broker account via Kite Connect for live trading data and order execution.
User interacts with AI chat interface for trading assistance, market insights, strategy recommendations, and portfolio optimization.
User monitors and manages trading signals through a mobile-optimized dashboard with alert notifications.
User accesses performance analytics and error reporting dashboards to monitor system health and trading strategy effectiveness.
User adjusts AI preferences, risk settings, and application configurations in the settings interface.
User tests features and reports issues via the integrated user testing interface, contributing to continuous improvement.
validation_criteria: Authentication completes successfully with OAuth2 and maintains secure JWT sessions with token refresh validation.
Portfolio data loads in real-time showing accurate holdings, P&L, and performance metrics matching backend data.
Broker integration correctly syncs account data, receives live market feeds, and executes orders without errors.
AI components respond accurately with relevant insights, maintain chat history, and handle API errors gracefully.
Trading signals are delivered in real-time with correct alerting and analytics functionality, optimized on mobile devices.
Mobile interface operates fully with offline support and passes accessibility audits (WCAG 2.1 compliance).
Error handling captures and reports errors globally, with functional user feedback and testing interfaces.
Performance dashboards display accurate metrics with no significant delays in data refresh or page load times.
Critical tests cover OAuth flows, AI component interactions, portfolio management accuracy, trading engine controls, cross-browser compatibility, and security scenarios.
System meets performance benchmarks: page load time <3 seconds, API response time <2 seconds, and supports 1000+ concurrent users with 99.9% uptime.
